mapper.select: select ti1.tagNum,t03.startDate,t03.start,ti1.Name,ti1.Sex,ti1.Age,ti1.MaritalStatus,t03.roomNum,t03.roomName ,t03.end,t03.endDate, ti1.health,ti1.image from TagInformation ti1 left join (select t01.tagNum,t01.startDate,t01.start,t01.end,t01.endDate,ri1.roomNum,ri1.roomName from time t01, (SELECT max(id) AS max_id,tagNum FROM time GROUP BY tagNum) t02 ,RoomInformation ri1 where t01.id=t02.max_id AND t01.cpid = ri1.cpid AND t01.wakeupNum = ri1.wakeupNum ) t03 on ti1.TagNum=t03.tagNum where ti1.Usefull = 'true' order by ti1.tagNum

select r1.roomId,r1.roomNum,r1.roomName,count(*) from baseData b1,RoomInformation r1 where b1.tagNum=#{tagNum} and b1.startDate=#{date} and b1.cpid != 9999 and b1.cpid=r1.cpid and b1.wakeupNumber=r1.wakeupNum group by r1.roomNum
